issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

Failed test cases are related to HDFS-9067..

Please review..

Thanks [~surendrasingh]
Some nits/suggestions.

1. IMO, you can change {{getSource()}} to {{getSrc()}} :) Just to be consistent with name.

2. Remove 'public' access modifier.

3. You can still include fileId along with 'src' in log message. It will be helpful IMO.

Thanks [~vinayrpet] for review,
Attached updated patch, Please review...
